item.title: Playing Rock–Paper–Scissors with 500 people
item.description: tl;dr: We played Rock–Paper–Scissors with 500 people in ~06:40 minutes to kick off a tech conference. It was a well-received energizer game and provided a lot of fun to all attendees.
